column4: I just add restricted, universe, and multiverse in all my ubuntu sources.   anything else I can't get... I compile... or find a stand alone .deb
don't forget main for all repositories
I have seen a problem cased by a person *removing* main and restricted from the breezy repository.  Caused him lots of problems
thats what I'm suggesting to him....  I'd like to see the results of his route -n on first boot
